page.title: 08HOLM EVANGELICAL CHURCH
page.content: There are games rooms with billiards,darts,table tennis etc. and a lounge to relax. There is also a library. During the week there are many activities, including a Youth Club,Family Service, Prayer Meeting Bible Hour, Communion Service and Covenanters. {COVENANTERS}was formed in 1928 in North London. There are Boy Covenanters and Girl Covenanters. There are thousands of members all over the world. Its name comes from Scotland where men and women died for their faith. They have camps, games, rallies etc. and work towards badges, awards and records. { ADVENTURERS}is for 7_9yrs.{JUCOS } (Junior Covenanters) 10-12yrs. and { {COVENANTERS}13yrs. and over.
